backend/main.mo: Actor implements researcher profile, interests, publications, contact info, and user profile management with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence reports listing implemented features, affected files, components, and related requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component setting up React Query, theme provider, and rendering the HomePage with a toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEditP: Provides a side panel with tabbed admin forms for editing profile, interests, publications, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactInf: Form for editing and saving email and affiliation with query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileEdi: Admin form to edit name, biography, and profile photo with upload and removal support.
frontend/src/components/admin/Publicatio: UI for adding new publications including title, description, optional link, and optional PDF upload.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResearchIn: Allows adding and deleting research interests, showing current interests with confirmation dialogs for removal.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays contact email and affiliation with loading skeletons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, theme toggle, login, and owner-only edit panel access.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section rendering profile photo, name, and biography with skeleton and fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity hooks and handles auth state transitions.
frontend/src/components/PublicationsSect: Displays a publications list with loading, empty, and populated states, rendering links or PDFs when available.
frontend/src/components/ResearchInterest: Shows research interests as badges with a loading skeleton and hides the section if none exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing identity loading, login, and logout through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Defines mutation hooks for profile, research interests, and publications, invalidating queries and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerStatus.ts: Queries whether the authenticated user is the owner and provides combined loading and auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides query hooks to fetch profile data, interests, publications, contact info, and the callerâ€™s user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Fetches profile-related data and renders the main homepage sections including hero, interests, publications, and contact info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature implementations, pending requests, and overall state for editable profile and access control features.
